_gram:
({#jarati, jIryati#},
{#jfRAti, jArayati-te, jajAra, jArayAmAsa, ajarat#}
{#ajArIt, ajIjarat, -jari-rI-tuM, jIrRa#} or  
{#jArita#})
_meanings:
{@--4@}
To break up or fall to pieces.

{@--1@} To make old, wear
out, consume.

{@--2@} To cause to be
digested; to digest.

{@--4@} To call out to, invoke,
praise.
